name: Actions Have Consequences
description:
This prototype was apart of my first attempt at a rapid ideation prototype game jam assigned to the university of Falmouth cohort. The theme depicted from the Dixit card of the jam was about Angels/Balance/Devil, Second attempt at trying 2D.

Solo developed within 5 days, Roles included but not limited to;

Core gameplay mechanics, Scripting, certain asset design, research, programming, map design and level design.

Music By Kuubi Music

https://twitter.com/KyuubiRaver

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_fM07F7htYJWcJg79Bm-wQ

Kubbi - Plume

Kubbi - Digestive Biscuit

Essentially your actions have consequences. Once you have no lives left.. you lose.

Navigate your way through this 2D platformer to finally escape.
